package.name: GroupDocs_Viewer_for_Java
package.summary: Powered by GroupDocs' Java document viewer library, GroupDocs Java Viewer for Magento adds advanced document viewer features to Magento sites.
package.description:
Powered by GroupDocs' Java document viewer library, GroupDocs Java Viewer for Magento adds advanced document viewer features to Magento sites. As well as being a Java PDF viewer, the extension supports almost 50 file formats, including Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Visio, and Outlook, OpenDocument formats, CAD graphics and raster images. Before installing: to use this extension you need to have a license for the GroupDocs.Viewer for Java library. To get a free 30-day evaluation license, please contact the sales team.

Key Benefits

  1. Host documents on your domain. GroupDocs.Viewer for Java is different from the cloud-based viewer in that it makes it possible to store and access documents from your local storage infrastructure.
  2. Native browser support. There is no need for Flash, Adobe Reader or any other 3rd party software installation client-side.
  3. High-quality display. Thanks to the HTML5 document viewer technology, spreadsheets, text documents, PowerPoint presentations, and other documents look as sharp as in the software that created them.
  4. Easy copy and paste. Native text rendering allows users to search for, select and copy text to the clipboard from documents embedded in the site with GroupDocs Java Viewer for Magento.
  5. Intuitive user interface. There's no learning curve: users can scroll or turn pages with a button, preview pages with thumbnails, download and print documents from a web-browser using familiar controls.

Supported File Formats

  • Portable Document Format: .pdf
  • Microsoft Word: .doc .docx .docm .dot .dotx .dotm
  • Microsoft Excel: .xls .xlsx .xlsm .xlt .xltx .xltm .xlsb .xml
  • Microsoft PowerPoint: .ppt .pptx .pptm
  • Microsoft Visio: .vsd .vss .vst .vsw .vdx .vsx .vtx .vsdx .vsdm .vssx .vssm .vstx .vstm .vsl
  • Microsoft Project: .mpp .mpt .mpx
  • Microsoft Outlook: .msg
  • OpenDocument Formats: .odt .ott .ods .odp
  • Rich Text Format: .rtf
  • Plain Text Format: .txt
  • Comma-Separated Values: .csv
  • HyperText Markup Language: .htm .html .mht .mhtml
  • XML Paper Specification: .xps
  • AutoCAD Drawing File Format: .dwg .dxf
  • Image files: .bmp .gif .jpg .png .tiff

Installing the Extension

Before you proceed: please be aware that this extension can be used only by registered users of the GroupDocs.Viewer for Java Library. Before you can use the extension, you need to buy a license. We offer a free evaluation version so that you can try it before committing. More information about the library and pricing can be found on GroupDocs' website. For detailed installation instructions, read the Java Viewer extension documentation.

Questions?

Please feel free to contact us!
